Game Text:	When you play this, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [Dwarven] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this from play or remove a [Dwarven] token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a [Dwarven] card, take it into your hand, otherwise, place it in your discard pile.
